message.simcitymod.chunk_not_residential: §cThis chunk is not residential and cannot be claimed.

message.simcitymod.home_not_set_default: §e[SimCity] No return point set. Teleporting to the initial spawn position.

message.simcitymod.setspawn_home_success: Home spawn point has been set.
message.simcitymod.setspawn_invalid: Invalid spawn type. (Use wild or home)
message.simcitymod.reset.not_supported_d: §cReset is not supported in this dimension. (Use in WILD/NETHER/END)
